segments.pli: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi … pe …
segments.en: There Venerable Sāriputta addressed the mendicants …
“Reverends, an unethical person, who lacks ethics, has destroyed a vital condition for having no regrets.

segments.pli: avippaṭisāre asati avippaṭisāravipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti … pe …
segments.en: When there are regrets, one who has regrets has destroyed a vital condition for joy. …
One who lacks disillusionment and dispassion has destroyed a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, rukkho sākhāpalāsavipanno. Tassa papaṭikāpi na pāripūriṃ gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … sāropi na pāripūriṃ gacchati.
segments.en: Suppose there was a tree that lacked branches and foliage. Its shoots, bark, softwood, and heartwood would not grow to fullness.

segments.pli: Evamevaṃ kho, āvuso, dussīlassa sīlavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti avippaṭisāro;
segments.en: In the same way, an unethical person, who lacks ethics, has destroyed a vital condition for having no regrets.

segments.pli: avippaṭisāre asati avippaṭisāravipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti … pe …
segments.en: When there are regrets, one who has regrets has destroyed a vital condition for joy. …
One who lacks disillusionment and dispassion has destroyed a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.

segments.pli: Sīlavato, āvuso, sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippaṭisāro;
segments.en: An ethical person, who has fulfilled ethics, has fulfilled a vital condition for not having regrets.

segments.pli: avippaṭisāre sati avippaṭisārasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti … pe …
segments.en: When there are no regrets, one who has no regrets has fulfilled a vital condition for joy. …
One who has fulfilled disillusionment and dispassion has fulfilled a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, rukkho sākhāpalāsasampanno. Tassa papaṭikāpi pāripūriṃ gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … sāropi pāripūriṃ gacchati.
segments.en: Suppose there was a tree that was complete with branches and foliage. Its shoots, bark, softwood, and heartwood would grow to fullness.

segments.pli: Evamevaṃ kho, āvuso, sīlavato sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippaṭisāro;
segments.en: In the same way, an ethical person, who has fulfilled ethics, has fulfilled a vital condition for not having regrets.

segments.pli: avippaṭisāre sati avippaṭisārasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti … pe …
segments.en: When there are no regrets, one who has no regrets has fulfilled a vital condition for joy. …
One who has fulfilled disillusionment and dispassion has fulfilled a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.”

sections.title: There Venerable Sāriputta addressed the mendicants …

suttaplex.blurb: Sāriputta teaches how, like a tree that grows due to its leaves, liberation follows when ethics is present.
